CustomField.description: This is a Rollup Field in which the 'Total - Sales Tax' field looks up to calculate Total Sales Tax for the Primary Quote This is not used on Quote Page Views and functions as a background formula field only
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a Rollup Field in which the 'Total - Sales Tax' field looks up to calculate Total Sales Tax for the Primary Quote This is not used on Quote Page Views and functions as a background formula field only
CustomField.label: Total - Sales Tax - Taxable costs
